titleStmt.title: The moste pleasaunt historye of Blanchardine, sonne to the King of Friz; & the faire lady Eglantine Queene of Tormaday, (surnamed) the proud ladye in loue
Blanchardine and Eglantine.
titleStmt.author: Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.
Goodwine, Thomas Pope.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for VVilliam Blackewall, and are to be solde at his shop, ouer against Guild-Hall Gate,

notesStmt.note: A paraphrase of Caxton's version by Thomas Pope Goodwine, who signs the dedication: P.T.G.
The second part has separate dated title page and register.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
